author: Jörn Poltz
title: Pass the salt: The minute details that helped Germany build virus defences
description: One January lunchtime in a car parts company, a worker turned to a colleague and asked to borrow the salt.
content:
MUNICH (Reuters) - One January lunchtime in a car parts company, a worker turned to a colleague and asked to borrow the salt. 
As well as the saltshaker, in that instant, they shared the new coronavirus, scientists have since concluded. 
That their exchange… [+8758 chars]
